slides.title: Welcome to ACCA APM
slides.content:
# Advanced Performance Management (APM)

APM covers **strategic performance** measurement and management.

## What You Will Learn

- **Strategic Performance** - Link to strategy
- **EVA and Value** - Value-based management
- **Measurement** - Advanced techniques
- **Decisions** - Strategic analysis

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Strategic planning | 10% |
| Performance measurement | 35% |
| Strategic decisions | 25% |
| Risk and control | 15% |
| Information systems | 15% |

slides.title: Value-Based Management
slides.content:
# VBM Concepts

## Shareholder Value Analysis

| Driver | Impact |
|--------|--------|
| Sales growth | Revenue |
| Operating margin | Profit |
| Tax rate | Cash after tax |
| Working capital | Cash tied up |
| Fixed investment | Capital needs |
| Cost of capital | Discount rate |

## Economic Value Added (EVA)

```
EVA = NOPAT - (Capital x WACC)

NOPAT = Net Operating Profit After Tax
```

## Improvements to EVA

- Grow NOPAT
- Improve capital efficiency
- Lower cost of capital
- Invest in positive NPV

slides.title: Performance Prism
slides.content:
# Stakeholder Approach

## Five Facets

| Facet | Question |
|-------|----------|
| Stakeholder satisfaction | What do they want? |
| Stakeholder contribution | What do we want? |
| Strategies | How to deliver? |
| Processes | Required activities |
| Capabilities | Skills and resources |

## Benefits

- Broader perspective
- Reciprocal relationships
- Strategic alignment

## Compared to BSC

| Prism | BSC |
|-------|-----|
| All stakeholders | Four perspectives |
| Reciprocal view | One-way |
| Flexibility | Structure |

slides.title: Transfer Pricing
slides.content:
# Divisional Pricing

## Methods

| Method | Formula |
|--------|--------|
| Market-based | External price |
| Cost-based | Cost + markup |
| Negotiated | Agreement |

## Minimum Transfer Price

```
Marginal cost + Opportunity cost
= Minimum TP
```

## International TP

| Objective | Consideration |
|-----------|---------------|
| Tax minimization | Arm's length |
| Profit shifting | OECD guidelines |
| Customs duty | Valuation rules |

## Goal Congruence

- Align division and company goals
- Fair evaluation
- Motivation

slides.title: Divisional Performance
slides.content:
# Measuring Divisions

## Traditional Measures

| Measure | Formula |
|---------|--------|
| ROI | PBIT / Capital |
| RI | PBIT - Capital Charge |

## ROI Issues

- Dysfunctional decisions
- Short-term focus
- Asset age distortion

## RI Advantages

- Absolute measure
- Encourages investment
- Different cost of capital

## Economic Measures

| Measure | Focus |
|---------|-------|
| EVA | Value creation |
| MVA | Market vs book |
| TSR | Shareholder return |
